title: 7TH SENSE TWO Bedroom DUPLEX Apartment For Sale.
details:
DUPLEX Two Bedroom LARGE Apartment For Immediate Sale At 7th SENSE Colombo 07.

Large master bedroom with En-Suite Toilet and first bedroom with a En-Suite toilet as well.

Fully furnished apartment with a total floor area of 2050 sq-ft.

Large Equipped Kitchen.

02 Car Park slots.

Facilities Such As:

Car Park, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Visitor Car Parking.

For Viewing And Other Further Information Of The Apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us
